name: Grindcast Studio
description: Profesionálne podcastové štúdio v Bratislave s kompletnou audio a video produkciou. Technická obsluha, postprodukcia a prenájom štúdia s moderným vybavením.

services.name: Podcast Recording
services.description: Professional audio and video podcast recording with 3 cameras and 4 microphones

services.name: Post-Production
services.description: Complete video editing, audio mixing, mastering, and color grading

services.name: Technical Support
services.description: Dedicated technician throughout your recording session

services.name: Studio Rental
services.description: Professional studio with equipment for up to 4 people

services.name: Social Media Content
services.description: Vertical clips for Reels, TikTok, and Shorts with subtitles

uniqueSellingPoints: Complete turnkey solution - no technical knowledge required
Professional technician included in all packages
Modern Sony cameras and Rode microphones
Vertical clips for social media included in Pro package
